casebody.data:
March 7, 1949.

Per Curiam Decisions.

No. 59. Marzani v. United States. Reargued February 28, 1949. Osmond K. Fraenkel and Allan R. Rosenberg reargued the cause for petitioner. Solicitor General Perl-man reargued the cause for the United States. Per Curiam:

Upon rehearing, 336 U. S. 910, the judgment entered December 20, 1948, 335 U. S. 895, affirming the judgment by an equally divided Court, is adhered to and reaffirmed by an equally divided Court. Mr. Justice Douglas took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
